snippet.textDisplay:
Dear Xi,
Congratulations for hosting the splendid Olympic Game!
REQUEST to Honorable President, XI:
Nepal is having problem, and therefore CANCEL YOUR Agreement with India on Lipulekh pass which is Nepal's sovereign territory. Your mistake is letting India to continue encroaching Nepal's Lipulekh and construct road there and infrastructures in Kalapani and Limpiyadhura, and keeping it's Military force to counter China. Please Act on this burning issue, immediately. This is URGENT.
Do you know? "Terrorism" has different forms. One of the forms is iIlegal occupation of Nepal's sovereign territory, Kalapani, Lipulekh, Limpiyadhura and Susta by BJP/India, using its might/military force and constructing infrastructures and torturing citizens there in spite of Nepal repeatedly officially opposing such a terrorism act and asking India to leave its occupied territories since 1962 Sino-India war in which India was badly defeated and on return its army stayed in Kalapani temporarily to keep eye on Chinese military forces, BUT is not leaving Kalapani, Lipulekh and Limpiyadhura as yet. India's illegal occupation of Kalapani must end immediately, just as also China to Cancel its unilateral agreement with India on Lipulekh, Nepal' sovereign land.
With your help on the above matter, Nepal-China Friendship will further grow.
Thank you
People of Nepal
snippet.textOriginal:
Dear Xi, 
Congratulations for hosting the splendid Olympic Game!
REQUEST to Honorable President, XI:
Nepal is having problem, and therefore CANCEL YOUR Agreement with India on Lipulekh pass which is Nepal's sovereign territory. Your mistake is letting  India to continue encroaching Nepal's Lipulekh and construct road there and infrastructures in Kalapani and Limpiyadhura, and keeping it's Military force to counter China. Please Act on this burning issue, immediately. This is URGENT.
Do you know? "Terrorism" has different forms. One of the forms is iIlegal occupation of Nepal's sovereign territory, Kalapani, Lipulekh, Limpiyadhura and Susta by BJP/India, using its might/military force and constructing infrastructures and torturing citizens there in spite of Nepal repeatedly officially opposing such a terrorism act and asking India to leave its occupied territories since 1962 Sino-India war in which India was badly defeated and on return its army stayed in Kalapani temporarily to keep eye on Chinese military forces, BUT is not leaving Kalapani, Lipulekh and Limpiyadhura as yet. India's illegal occupation of Kalapani must end immediately, just as also China to Cancel its unilateral agreement with India on Lipulekh, Nepal' sovereign land.
With your help on the above matter,  Nepal-China Friendship will further grow.
Thank you
People of Nepal

snippet.textDisplay:
As a chinese, i don’t need any more western validation. Why are we still so obsessed with few of these foreigners “appreciate” China ? Who cares, he likes it here, ok , so what ? If he hates China, also, so what. No need to report this, as if we need to throw a red carpet for these westerners who come to China.

Again, I don’t care x I have seen enough “foreigners” nothing damn special.

We need to take care our own citizens. Chinese citizens COME FIRST
snippet.textOriginal:
